com.epoch.db

Class ResponseLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.ResponseLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorConstants, QuestionConstants, XMLConstants

    public final class ResponseLogger
extends DBCommon
implements AuthorConstants, QuestionConstants
    Logs all responses to a file for each question.
    Uses locks to prevent race conditions.
    Reads and returns a summary of the stored responses.

    All responses stored in a single directory (given is chimp.properties)
    <qId>.log master
    <qId>.summary master
    <user-id>.<qId>.log locally modified and locally added
    <user-id>.<qId>.summary locally modified and locally added

    in file, single line is <smiles|MOLorMRV>

      • debugPrint

        private static void debugPrint(Object... msg)

      • logResponse

        public static void logResponse(int qId,
                               int qType,
                               long qFlags,
                               String response)
                        throws ConfigurationException,
                               ParameterException
        Log a student response to an ordinary question.
        Parameters:
        qId - unique ID number of the question to which the student responded
        qType - type of the question (skeletal, ranking, etc.)
        qFlags - flags of the question
        response - String representation of the student's response
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the response log directory doesn't exist
        ParameterException - if the response can't be converted into the appropriate response object

      • logResponse

        public static void logResponse(int qId,
                               int qType,
                               long qFlags,
                               String authorId,
                               String response)
                        throws ConfigurationException,
                               ParameterException
        Log a student response to an ordinary question.
        Parameters:
        qId - unique ID number of the question to which the student responded
        qType - type of the question (skeletal, ranking, etc.)
        qFlags - flags of the question
        authorId - login ID of the author of the question to which the student responded, if it is locally authored; otherwise null
        response - String representation of the student's response
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the response log directory doesn't exist
        ParameterException - if the response can't be converted into the appropriate response object

      • logExamResponse

        public static void logExamResponse(int examId,
                                   int qNum,
                                   String studentName,
                                   EvalResult evalResult,
                                   TimeZone timeZone)
                            throws ConfigurationException
        Log a student response to an exam question.
        Parameters:
        examId - unique (external) ID of the assignment acting as an exam
        qNum - 1-based serial number of the question to which the student responded
        studentName - name of the student responding to the question
        evalResult - contains the response, response time, number of tries
        timeZone - the time zone of the course of the assignment to which this response was a reply
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the response log directory doesn't exist

                                TimeZone timeZone,

                                String ipAddr)
                         throws ConfigurationException
        Log student entry into an exam assignment.
        Parameters:
        examId - unique (external) ID of the assignment acting as an exam
        studentName - name of the student responding to the question
        timeZone - the time zone of the course of the assignment to which this response was a reply
        host - name of host of the student's computer
        ipAddr - IP address of the student's computer
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the response log directory doesn't exist

      • getResponses

        public static StoredResponse[] getResponses(int qId,
                                            int qType,
                                            long qFlags)
                                     throws ConfigurationException,
                                            NonReadableChannelException,
                                            NonWritableChannelException
        Get the most frequent logged responses to this question.
        Parameters:
        qId - unique ID of the question the response to which are desired
        qType - type of the question (skeletal, ranking, etc.)
        qFlags - flags of the question
        Returns:
        array of stored responses
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the response log directory doesn't exist
        NonReadableChannelException
        NonWritableChannelException

      • getResponses

        public static StoredResponse[] getResponses(int qId,
                                            String authorId,
                                            int qType,
                                            long qFlags)
                                     throws ConfigurationException,
                                            NonReadableChannelException,
                                            NonWritableChannelException
        Get the most frequent logged responses to this question. Read the responses logged since the last time this method was called for this question, and incorporate them into the summary (responses and number of occurrences of each) of previously processed responses.
        Parameters:
        qId - unique ID of the question the response to which are desired
        authorId - login ID of the author of the question to which the student responded, if it is locally authored; otherwise null
        qType - type of the question (skeletal, ranking, etc.)
        qFlags - flags of the question
        Returns:
        array of stored responses
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the response log directory doesn't exist
        NonReadableChannelException
        NonWritableChannelException

      • doGetResponses

        private static StoredResponse[] doGetResponses(StringBuilder filePrefix,
                                               int qType,
                                               long qFlags,
                                               int qId,
                                               String authorId)
                                        throws IOException,
                                               NonReadableChannelException,
                                               NonWritableChannelException,
                                               ConfigurationException
        Get the most frequent logged responses to this question.
        Parameters:
        filePrefix - name of log file without the extension
        qType - type of the question (skeletal, ranking, etc.)
        qFlags - flags of the question
        qId - unique ID of the question the response to which are desired
        authorId - login ID of the author of the question to which the student responded, if it is locally authored; otherwise null
        Returns:
        array of stored responses
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the response log directory doesn't exist
        IOException - if the log file can't be read to written to
        NonReadableChannelException
        NonWritableChannelException
